basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, fruiting period June-August
basic.color: Flower color purple, light green or white；fruit color brown or black

maintenance.soil: Slightly acidic soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, may grow in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Pruning accordingly for any favorate tree shapes
